Static Site Template

Simple static site template with Rolllup to allow easy project scaffolding with SCSS and Typescript.

Getting started:

  1. Get this template from Github with degit: npx degit luke-codewalker/templates_static-site
  2. Install the dependencies with npm i
  3. Run npm start and got to http://localhost:5000/
  4. Happy hacking ðŸš€ðŸŽ‰!
